confirmation.title: {isEnable, plural, =1 {enable Pro-mode} other {disabling Pro-mode}}
confirmation.description: Changes you did so far will not be safe.

block1.title: What is Interest LST?
block1.description: Interest LST is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol allowing users to stake Sui and earn iSui without locking up their funds. They can withdraw their initial deposit and rewards anytime by returning iSui.

block2.title: Is Interest LST decentralized?
block2.description: Yes, Interest LST is fully decentralized and open source. Users can stake and unstake with any validator on-chain. The admin only controls fee parameters, which are capped to protect users.

block3.title: How does it work?
block3.description: Interest LST uses smart contracts to deposit Sui on a validator, securing the network. In return, users receive Sui. It's a safe DeFi investment option.

block4.title: What are the advantages of using Interest LST?
block4.description: Interest LST allows you to earn Sui while keeping your funds liquid, unlike traditional staking. It offers the best of both worlds.

block5.title: Are there any fees on Interest LST?
block5.description: Yes, there's a deposit fee on Interest LST. It's a dynamic fee promoting decentralization, based on a validator's stake relative to the total stake in the protocol.
